constituent: ritual, moon, month, flesh, part of the body, crotch, altar, show, two, small
heisigStory: Flesh . . . crotch . . . altar. Note how the second element is cut short, giving a tent-like effect to the character.
koohiiStory1: A ritual such as a circumcision: a small piece of flesh from the crotch is left on the altar.
koohiiStory2: There are many famous penis matsuris(festivals) in Japan. The rituals of these festivals involve placing the flesh of the crotch on an altar.
readingExamples: 祭り (まつ.り), 祭る (まつ.る)
words:
祭日(さいじつ): national holiday, festival day
祭(まつり): festival, feast
祭る(まつる): deify, enshrine
お祭り(おまつり): festival
